title: Strategies for Utilizing Artificial Intelligence (AI) in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical environment setup using digital devices (tablets, laptops) with continuous feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Using AI-based simulation tools, learners can analyze patient monitoring scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
In nursing practice, learners can identify and discuss at least three ethical issues of AI (privacy protection, human-centricity).
Using an AI education platform, learners can design personalized learning paths and complete over 90% of self-directed practical assignments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
